qmmm.help: Executes qmmm calculations for individual molecules and clusters

print_regions_pdb.help: print the geometry of the regions to a pdb file

max_iterations.help: max iterations for qmmm scf loop

job_file.help: name of jobfile to which jobs are written

regions.help: definition of regions in qmmm setup. First region can be a QM region. In each region all options can be also read from a jobfile by the keyword 'jobfile'

id.help: id of a region has to start from 0

package.help: Defaults for the Quantum Mechanics packages
package.name: xtp

four_center_method.help: method to compute the four-center integrals

energy.help: DeltaE at which calculation is converged

method.help: Main method to use for convergence accelertation

DIIS_start.help: DIIS error at which DIIS takes over

ADIIS_start.help: DIIS error at which ADIIS takes over

DIIS_length.help: old hamiltonians to keep in history

DIIS_maxout.help: if true remove the maximum element in the history if DIIS_length is exceeded.Otherwise, the oldest element is removed.

levelshift_end.help: DIIS error at levelshifting is disabled

mixing.help: mixing parameter for linear mixing of density matrices

initial_guess.help: Method to use to make initial guess, independent(electrons) or atom(densities)

gwbse.help: xml file with options for gwbse calculations

ranges.help: default: all levels in RPA, 1:2*HOMO in QP and all in BSE; other options: factor,explicit

rpamax.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, number of levels in rpa

qpmin.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, lowest MO to be used in GW

qpmax.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, highest MO to be used in GW

bsemin.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, lowest MO to be used in BSE

bsemax.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, highest MO to be used in BSE

vxc.help: Exchange correlation functional computation for GW

scissor_shift.help: preshift unoccupied MOs by a constant for GW calculation

mode.help: use single short (G0W0) or self-consistent GW (evGW)

eta.help: small parameter eta of the Green's function

exctotal.help: maximum number of BSE states to calculate

ignore_corelevels.help: exclude core MO level from calculation on RPA,GW or BSE level

domatrixfree.help: solve without explicitly setting up BSE matrix, (slower but a lot less memory required

gw_sc_max_iterations.help: Maximum number of iterations in eVGW

gw_mixing_order.help: Mixing of QP energies in evGW - 0: plain, 1: linear, >1: Anderson

g_sc_max_iterations.help: maximum number of iterations for quasiparticle equation solution

use_Hqp_offdiag.help: Using symmetrized off-diagonal elements of QP Hamiltonian in BSE

sigma_plot_states.help: plot sigma(omega) for the following states, e.g 1 3 5

sigma_plot_filename.hep: File with the sigma plot data

bse_print_weight.help: print exciton WF composition weight larger than minimum

rebuild_threecenter_freq.help: how often the 3c integrals in iterate should be rebuilt

statetracker.help: filter to identify excited states from some characteristic and not the energy

filter.help: filter to identify excited states from some characteristic and not the energy

state.help: qmstate to calculate i.e. n or s1

segments.help: which segments to include in this region and which geometry they have
